Description: Painted pottery shabti of Nbt pr Šmʿyt n Imn Inhy with a blue lappet-wig, a brown modelled face with black and white eyes, a blue and white collar that encloses the parallel brown hands in relief holding two red hoes; the front of the yellow leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs flanked by six similar rows; the back is decorated with a red and yellow representation of a seed-basket beneath a red yoke with two pendular nw-pots.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
